title: Northern Ireland's violent past looms over last-ditch Brexit talks
text:
Northern Ireland's violent past looms over last-ditch Brexit talks

Analysis: These are distressing times for those of us who were children when "the Troubles" began, who lived through its daily carnage.
authors: Bill Neely Is Nbc News' Chief Global Correspondent. He Joined Nbc News Britain S Itv News In January His Reports Across The Globe Have Earned Many Awards
Including An Unprecedented Three Consecutive Baftas
The British Equivalent Of The Oscars
meta_description: These are troubling times for those of us who lived through Northern Ireland's carnage and who believe lives are at stake in the Brexit drama.

og.title: Ghosts of Northern Ireland's violent past haunt U.K. as Brexit looms
